00049 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00050 
00051 #include <linux/user_namespace.h>
00052 #ifdef HAVE_UIDGID_HEADER
00053 # include <linux/uidgid.h>
00054 #endif

00056 #include <lnet/nidstr.h>

00059 typedef enum ucred_init_type {
00060         NONE_INIT       = 0,
00061         BODY_INIT       = 1,
00062         REC_INIT        = 2
00063 } ucred_init_type_t;
00064 
00065 void mdt_exit_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00066 {
00067         struct lu_ucred   *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00068         struct mdt_device *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00069 
00070         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00071         if (uc->uc_valid != UCRED_INIT) {
00072                 uc->uc_suppgids[0] = uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00073                 if (uc->uc_ginfo) {
00074                         put_group_info(uc->uc_ginfo);
00075                         uc->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00076                 }
00077                 if (uc->uc_identity) {
00078                         mdt_identity_put(mdt->mdt_identity_cache,
00079                                          uc->uc_identity);
00080                         uc->uc_identity = NULL;
00081                 }
00082                 uc->uc_valid = UCRED_INIT;
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 static int match_nosquash_list(struct rw_semaphore *sem,
00087                                struct list_head *nidlist,
00088                                lnet_nid_t peernid)
00089 {
00090         int rc;
00091         ENTRY;
00092         down_read(sem);
00093         rc = cfs_match_nid(peernid, nidlist);
00094         up_read(sem);
00095         RETURN(rc);
00096 }
00097 
00098 /* root_squash for inter-MDS operations */
00099 static int mdt_root_squash(struct mdt_thread_info *info, lnet_nid_t peernid)
00100 {
00101         struct lu_ucred *ucred = mdt_ucred(info);
00102         struct root_squash_info *squash = &info->mti_mdt->mdt_squash;
00103         ENTRY;
00104 
00105         LASSERT(ucred != NULL);
00106         if (!squash->rsi_uid || ucred->uc_fsuid)
00107                 RETURN(0);
00108 
00109         if (match_nosquash_list(&squash->rsi_sem,
00110                                 &squash->rsi_nosquash_nids,
00111                                 peernid)) {
00112                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "%s is in nosquash_nids list\n",
00113                        libcfs_nid2str(peernid));
00114                 RETURN(0);
00115         }
00116 
00117         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "squash req from %s, (%d:%d/%x)=>(%d:%d/%x)\n",
00118                libcfs_nid2str(peernid),
00119                ucred->uc_fsuid, ucred->uc_fsgid, ucred->uc_cap,
00120                squash->rsi_uid, squash->rsi_gid, 0);
00121 
00122         ucred->uc_fsuid = squash->rsi_uid;
00123         ucred->uc_fsgid = squash->rsi_gid;
00124         ucred->uc_cap = 0;
00125         ucred->uc_suppgids[0] = -1;
00126         ucred->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00127 
00128         RETURN(0);
00129 }
00130 
00131 static void ucred_set_jobid(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct lu_ucred *uc)
00132 {
00133         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00134         const char              *jobid = mdt_req_get_jobid(req);
00135 
00136         /* set jobid if specified. */
00137         if (jobid)
00138                 strlcpy(uc->uc_jobid, jobid, sizeof(uc->uc_jobid));
00139         else
00140                 uc->uc_jobid[0] = '\0';
00141 }
00142 
00143 static int new_init_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info, ucred_init_type_t type,
00144                           void *buf, bool drop_fs_cap)
00145 {
00146         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00147         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00148         struct ptlrpc_user_desc *pud = req->rq_user_desc;
00149         struct lu_ucred         *ucred = mdt_ucred(info);
00150         lnet_nid_t               peernid = req->rq_peer.nid;
00151         __u32                    perm = 0;
00152         __u32                    remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00153         int                      setuid;
00154         int                      setgid;
00155         int                      rc = 0;
00156 
00157         ENTRY;
00158 
00159         LASSERT(req->rq_auth_gss);
00160         LASSERT(!req->rq_auth_usr_mdt);
00161         LASSERT(req->rq_user_desc);
00162         LASSERT(ucred != NULL);
00163 
00164         ucred->uc_valid = UCRED_INVALID;
00165 
00166         ucred->uc_o_uid   = pud->pud_uid;
00167         ucred->uc_o_gid   = pud->pud_gid;
00168         ucred->uc_o_fsuid = pud->pud_fsuid;
00169         ucred->uc_o_fsgid = pud->pud_fsgid;
00170 
00171         if (type == BODY_INIT) {
00172                 struct mdt_body *body = (struct mdt_body *)buf;
00173 
00174                 ucred->uc_suppgids[0] = body->mbo_suppgid;
00175                 ucred->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00176         }
00177 
00178         /* sanity check: we expect the uid which client claimed is true */
00179         if (remote) {
00180                 if (!uid_valid(make_kuid(&init_user_ns, req->rq_auth_mapped_uid))) {
00181                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote user not mapped, deny access!\n");
00182                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 if (ptlrpc_user_desc_do_idmap(req, pud))
00186                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00187 
00188                 if (req->rq_auth_mapped_uid != pud->pud_uid) {
00189                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client %s: auth/mapped uid %u/%u "
00190                                "while client claims %u:%u/%u:%u\n",
00191                                libcfs_nid2str(peernid), req->rq_auth_uid,
00192                                req->rq_auth_mapped_uid,
00193                                pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00194                                pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid);
00195                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00196                 }
00197         } else {
00198                 if (req->rq_auth_uid != pud->pud_uid) {
00199                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "local client %s: auth uid %u "
00200                                "while client claims %u:%u/%u:%u\n",
00201                                libcfs_nid2str(peernid), req->rq_auth_uid,
00202                                pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00203                                pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid);
00204                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00205                 }
00206         }
00207 
00208         if (is_identity_get_disabled(mdt->mdt_identity_cache)) {
00209                 if (remote) {
00210                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client must run with identity_get "
00211                                "enabled!\n");
00212                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00213                 } else {
00214                         ucred->uc_identity = NULL;
00215                         perm = CFS_SETUID_PERM | CFS_SETGID_PERM |
00216                                CFS_SETGRP_PERM;
00217                 }
00218         } else {
00219                 struct md_identity *identity;
00220 
00221                 identity = mdt_identity_get(mdt->mdt_identity_cache,
00222                                             pud->pud_uid);
00223                 if (IS_ERR(identity)) {
00224                         if (unlikely(PTR_ERR(identity) == -EREMCHG &&
00225                                      !remote)) {
00226                                 ucred->uc_identity = NULL;
00227                                 perm = CFS_SETUID_PERM | CFS_SETGID_PERM |
00228                                        CFS_SETGRP_PERM;
00229                         } else {
00230                                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "Deny access without identity: uid %u\n",
00231                                        pud->pud_uid);
00232                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00233                         }
00234                 } else {
00235                         ucred->uc_identity = identity;
00236                         perm = mdt_identity_get_perm(ucred->uc_identity,
00237                                                      remote, peernid);
00238                 }
00239         }
00240 
00241         /* find out the setuid/setgid attempt */
00242         setuid = (pud->pud_uid != pud->pud_fsuid);
00243         setgid = ((pud->pud_gid != pud->pud_fsgid) ||
00244                   (ucred->uc_identity &&
00245                    (pud->pud_gid != ucred->uc_identity->mi_gid)));
00246 
00247         /* check permission of setuid */
00248         if (setuid && !(perm & CFS_SETUID_PERM)) {
00249                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "mdt blocked setuid attempt (%u -> %u) from %s\n",
00250                        pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_fsuid, libcfs_nid2str(peernid));
00251                 GOTO(out, rc = -EACCES);
00252         }
00253 
00254         /* check permission of setgid */
00255         if (setgid && !(perm & CFS_SETGID_PERM)) {
00256                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "mdt blocked setgid attempt (%u:%u/%u:%u -> %u) "
00257                        "from %s\n", pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00258                        pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid,
00259                        ucred->uc_identity->mi_gid, libcfs_nid2str(peernid));
00260                 GOTO(out, rc = -EACCES);
00261         }
00262 
00263         /*
00264          * NB: remote client not allowed to setgroups anyway.
00265          */
00266         if (!remote && perm & CFS_SETGRP_PERM) {
00267                 if (pud->pud_ngroups) {
00268                         /* setgroups for local client */
00269                         ucred->uc_ginfo = groups_alloc(pud->pud_ngroups);
00270                         if (!ucred->uc_ginfo) {
00271                                 CERROR("failed to alloc %d groups\n",
00272                                        pud->pud_ngroups);
00273                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         lustre_groups_from_list(ucred->uc_ginfo,
00277                                                 pud->pud_groups);
00278                         lustre_groups_sort(ucred->uc_ginfo);
00279                 } else {
00280                         ucred->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00281                 }
00282         } else {
00283                 ucred->uc_suppgids[0] = -1;
00284                 ucred->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00285                 ucred->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00286         }
00287 
00288         ucred->uc_uid   = pud->pud_uid;
00289         ucred->uc_gid   = pud->pud_gid;
00290         ucred->uc_fsuid = pud->pud_fsuid;
00291         ucred->uc_fsgid = pud->pud_fsgid;
00292 
00293         /* process root_squash here. */
00294         mdt_root_squash(info, peernid);
00295 
00296         /* remove fs privilege for non-root user. */
00297         if (ucred->uc_fsuid && drop_fs_cap)
00298                 ucred->uc_cap = pud->pud_cap & ~CFS_CAP_FS_MASK;
00299         else
00300                 ucred->uc_cap = pud->pud_cap;
00301         if (remote && !(perm & CFS_RMTOWN_PERM))
00302                 ucred->uc_cap &= ~(CFS_CAP_SYS_RESOURCE_MASK |
00303                                    CFS_CAP_CHOWN_MASK);
00304         ucred->uc_valid = UCRED_NEW;
00305         ucred_set_jobid(info, ucred);
00306 
00307         EXIT;
00308 
00309 out:
00310         if (rc) {
00311                 if (ucred->uc_ginfo) {
00312                         put_group_info(ucred->uc_ginfo);
00313                         ucred->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00314                 }
00315                 if (ucred->uc_identity) {
00316                         mdt_identity_put(mdt->mdt_identity_cache,
00317                                          ucred->uc_identity);
00318                         ucred->uc_identity = NULL;
00319                 }
00320         }
00321 
00322         return rc;
00323 }
00324 
00334 bool allow_client_chgrp(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct lu_ucred *uc)
00335 {
00336         __u32 remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00337         __u32 perm;
00338 
00339         /* 1. If identity_upcall is disabled, then forbid remote client to set
00340          *    supplementary group IDs, but permit local client to do that. */
00341         if (is_identity_get_disabled(info->mti_mdt->mdt_identity_cache)) {
00342                 if (remote)
00343                         return false;
00344 
00345                 return true;
00346         }
00347 
00348         /* 2. If fail to get related identities, then forbid any client to
00349          *    set supplementary group IDs. */
00350         if (uc->uc_identity == NULL)
00351                 return false;
00352 
00353         /* 3. Check the permission in the identities. */
00354         perm = mdt_identity_get_perm(uc->uc_identity, remote,
00355                                      mdt_info_req(info)->rq_peer.nid);
00356         if (perm & CFS_SETGRP_PERM)
00357                 return true;
00358 
00359         return false;
00360 }
00361 
00362 int mdt_check_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00363 {
00364         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00365         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00366         struct ptlrpc_user_desc *pud = req->rq_user_desc;
00367         struct lu_ucred         *ucred = mdt_ucred(info);
00368         struct md_identity      *identity = NULL;
00369         lnet_nid_t               peernid = req->rq_peer.nid;
00370         __u32                    perm = 0;
00371         __u32                    remote = exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp);
00372         int                      setuid;
00373         int                      setgid;
00374         int                      rc = 0;
00375 
00376         ENTRY;
00377 
00378         LASSERT(ucred != NULL);
00379         if ((ucred->uc_valid == UCRED_OLD) || (ucred->uc_valid == UCRED_NEW))
00380                 RETURN(0);
00381 
00382         if (!req->rq_auth_gss || req->rq_auth_usr_mdt || !req->rq_user_desc)
00383                 RETURN(0);
00384 
00385         /* sanity check: if we use strong authentication, we expect the
00386          * uid which client claimed is true */
00387         if (remote) {
00388                 if (!uid_valid(make_kuid(&init_user_ns, req->rq_auth_mapped_uid))) {
00389                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote user not mapped, deny access!\n");
00390                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00391                 }
00392 
00393                 if (ptlrpc_user_desc_do_idmap(req, pud))
00394                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00395 
00396                 if (req->rq_auth_mapped_uid != pud->pud_uid) {
00397                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client %s: auth/mapped uid %u/%u "
00398                                "while client claims %u:%u/%u:%u\n",
00399                                libcfs_nid2str(peernid), req->rq_auth_uid,
00400                                req->rq_auth_mapped_uid,
00401                                pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00402                                pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid);
00403                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00404                 }
00405         } else {
00406                 if (req->rq_auth_uid != pud->pud_uid) {
00407                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "local client %s: auth uid %u "
00408                                "while client claims %u:%u/%u:%u\n",
00409                                libcfs_nid2str(peernid), req->rq_auth_uid,
00410                                pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00411                                pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid);
00412                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00413                 }
00414         }
00415 
00416         if (is_identity_get_disabled(mdt->mdt_identity_cache)) {
00417                 if (remote) {
00418                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client must run with identity_get "
00419                                "enabled!\n");
00420                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00421                 }
00422                 RETURN(0);
00423         }
00424 
00425         identity = mdt_identity_get(mdt->mdt_identity_cache, pud->pud_uid);
00426         if (IS_ERR(identity)) {
00427                 if (unlikely(PTR_ERR(identity) == -EREMCHG &&
00428                              !remote)) {
00429                         RETURN(0);
00430                 } else {
00431                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "Deny access without identity: uid %u\n",
00432                                pud->pud_uid);
00433                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00434                }
00435         }
00436 
00437         perm = mdt_identity_get_perm(identity, remote, peernid);
00438         /* find out the setuid/setgid attempt */
00439         setuid = (pud->pud_uid != pud->pud_fsuid);
00440         setgid = (pud->pud_gid != pud->pud_fsgid ||
00441                   pud->pud_gid != identity->mi_gid);
00442 
00443         /* check permission of setuid */
00444         if (setuid && !(perm & CFS_SETUID_PERM)) {
00445                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "mdt blocked setuid attempt (%u -> %u) from %s\n",
00446                        pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_fsuid, libcfs_nid2str(peernid));
00447                 GOTO(out, rc = -EACCES);
00448         }
00449 
00450         /* check permission of setgid */
00451         if (setgid && !(perm & CFS_SETGID_PERM)) {
00452                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "mdt blocked setgid attempt (%u:%u/%u:%u -> %u) "
00453                        "from %s\n", pud->pud_uid, pud->pud_gid,
00454                        pud->pud_fsuid, pud->pud_fsgid, identity->mi_gid,
00455                        libcfs_nid2str(peernid));
00456                 GOTO(out, rc = -EACCES);
00457         }
00458 
00459         EXIT;
00460 
00461 out:
00462         mdt_identity_put(mdt->mdt_identity_cache, identity);
00463         return rc;
00464 }
00465 
00466 static int old_init_ucred_common(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00467                                   bool drop_fs_cap)
00468 {
00469         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00470         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00471         struct md_identity      *identity = NULL;
00472         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap =
00473                 info->mti_exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00474 
00475         if (nodemap == NULL) {
00476                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "%s: cli %s/%p nodemap not set.\n",
00477                        mdt2obd_dev(mdt)->obd_name,
00478                        info->mti_exp->exp_client_uuid.uuid, info->mti_exp);
00479                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00480         }
00481 
00482         if (!is_identity_get_disabled(mdt->mdt_identity_cache)) {
00483                 identity = mdt_identity_get(mdt->mdt_identity_cache,
00484                                             uc->uc_fsuid);
00485                 if (IS_ERR(identity)) {
00486                         if (unlikely(PTR_ERR(identity) == -EREMCHG ||
00487                                      uc->uc_cap & CFS_CAP_FS_MASK)) {
00488                                 identity = NULL;
00489                         } else {
00490                                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "Deny access without identity: "
00491                                        "uid %u\n", uc->uc_fsuid);
00492                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00493                         }
00494                 }
00495         }
00496         uc->uc_identity = identity;
00497 
00498         if (uc->uc_o_uid == nodemap->nm_squash_uid) {
00499                 uc->uc_fsuid = nodemap->nm_squash_uid;
00500                 uc->uc_fsgid = nodemap->nm_squash_gid;
00501                 uc->uc_cap = 0;
00502                 uc->uc_suppgids[0] = -1;
00503                 uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00504         }
00505 
00506         /* process root_squash here. */
00507         mdt_root_squash(info, mdt_info_req(info)->rq_peer.nid);
00508 
00509         /* remove fs privilege for non-root user. */
00510         if (uc->uc_fsuid && drop_fs_cap)
00511                 uc->uc_cap &= ~CFS_CAP_FS_MASK;
00512         uc->uc_valid = UCRED_OLD;
00513         ucred_set_jobid(info, uc);
00514 
00515         return 0;
00516 }
00517 
00518 static int old_init_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00519                           struct mdt_body *body, bool drop_fs_cap)
00520 {
00521         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00522         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap =
00523                 info->mti_exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00524         int                      rc;
00525         ENTRY;
00526 
00527         body->mbo_uid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00528                                        NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, body->mbo_uid);
00529         body->mbo_gid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00530                                        NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, body->mbo_gid);
00531         body->mbo_fsuid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00532                                        NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, body->mbo_fsuid);
00533         body->mbo_fsgid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00534                                        NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, body->mbo_fsgid);
00535 
00536         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00537         uc->uc_valid = UCRED_INVALID;
00538         uc->uc_o_uid = uc->uc_uid = body->mbo_uid;
00539         uc->uc_o_gid = uc->uc_gid = body->mbo_gid;
00540         uc->uc_o_fsuid = uc->uc_fsuid = body->mbo_fsuid;
00541         uc->uc_o_fsgid = uc->uc_fsgid = body->mbo_fsgid;
00542         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = body->mbo_suppgid;
00543         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00544         uc->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00545         uc->uc_cap = body->mbo_capability;
00546 
00547         rc = old_init_ucred_common(info, drop_fs_cap);
00548 
00549         RETURN(rc);
00550 }
00551 
00552 static int old_init_ucred_reint(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00553 {
00554         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00555         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap =
00556                 info->mti_exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00557         int                      rc;
00558         ENTRY;
00559 
00560         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00561 
00562         uc->uc_fsuid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00563                                       NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, uc->uc_fsuid);
00564         uc->uc_fsgid = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00565                                       NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, uc->uc_fsgid);
00566 
00567         uc->uc_valid = UCRED_INVALID;
00568         uc->uc_o_uid = uc->uc_o_fsuid = uc->uc_uid = uc->uc_fsuid;
00569         uc->uc_o_gid = uc->uc_o_fsgid = uc->uc_gid = uc->uc_fsgid;
00570         uc->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00571 
00572         rc = old_init_ucred_common(info, true); /* drop_fs_cap = true */
00573 
00574         RETURN(rc);
00575 }
00576 
00577 static inline int __mdt_init_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00578                                    struct mdt_body *body,
00579                                    bool drop_fs_cap)
00580 {
00581         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00582         struct lu_ucred         *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00583 
00584         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00585         if ((uc->uc_valid == UCRED_OLD) || (uc->uc_valid == UCRED_NEW))
00586                 return 0;
00587 
00588         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00589 
00590         if (!req->rq_auth_gss || req->rq_auth_usr_mdt || !req->rq_user_desc)
00591                 return old_init_ucred(info, body, drop_fs_cap);
00592         else
00593                 return new_init_ucred(info, BODY_INIT, body, drop_fs_cap);
00594 }
00595 
00596 int mdt_init_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_body *body)
00597 {
00598         return __mdt_init_ucred(info, body, true);
00599 }
00600 
00601 /* LU-6528 when "no_subtree_check" is set for NFS export, nfsd_set_fh_dentry()
00602  * doesn't set correct fsuid explicitely, but raise capability to allow
00603  * exportfs_decode_fh() to reconnect disconnected dentry into dcache. So for
00604  * lookup (i.e. intent_getattr), we should keep FS capability, otherwise it
00605  * will fail permission check. */
00606 int mdt_init_ucred_intent_getattr(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00607                                   struct mdt_body *body)
00608 {
00609         return __mdt_init_ucred(info, body, false);
00610 }
00611 
00612 int mdt_init_ucred_reint(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00613 {
00614         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00615         struct lu_ucred       *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
00616 
00617         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00618         if ((uc->uc_valid == UCRED_OLD) || (uc->uc_valid == UCRED_NEW))
00619                 return 0;
00620 
00621         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00622 
00623         if (!req->rq_auth_gss || req->rq_auth_usr_mdt || !req->rq_user_desc)
00624                 return old_init_ucred_reint(info);
00625         else
00626                 return new_init_ucred(info, REC_INIT, NULL, true);
00627 }
00628 
00629 /* copied from lov/lov_ea.c, just for debugging, will be removed later */
00630 void mdt_dump_lmm(int level, const struct lov_mds_md *lmm, __u64 valid)
00631 {
00632         const struct lov_ost_data_v1    *lod;
00633         int                              i;
00634         __u16                            count;
00635 
00636         if (likely(!cfs_cdebug_show(level, DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM)))
00637                 return;
00638 
00639         count = le16_to_cpu(((struct lov_user_md *)lmm)->lmm_stripe_count);
00640 
00641         CDEBUG(level, "objid "DOSTID", magic 0x%08X, pattern %#X\n",
00642                POSTID(&lmm->lmm_oi), le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_magic),
00643                le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern));
00644         CDEBUG(level, "stripe_size=0x%x, stripe_count=0x%x\n",
00645                le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_size), count);
00646 
00647         /* If it's a directory or a released file, then there are
00648          * no actual objects to print, so bail out. */
00649         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLDIREA ||
00650             le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern) & LOV_PATTERN_F_RELEASED)
00651                 return;
00652 
00653         LASSERT(count <= LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT);
00654         for (i = 0, lod = lmm->lmm_objects; i < count; i++, lod++) {
00655                 struct ost_id oi;
00656 
00657                 ostid_le_to_cpu(&lod->l_ost_oi, &oi);
00658                 CDEBUG(level, "stripe %u idx %u subobj "DOSTID"\n",
00659                        i, le32_to_cpu(lod->l_ost_idx), POSTID(&oi));
00660         }
00661 }
00662 
00663 void mdt_dump_lmv(unsigned int level, const union lmv_mds_md *lmv)
00664 {
00665         const struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmm1;
00666         int                        i;
00667 
00668         if (likely(!cfs_cdebug_show(level, DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM)))
00669                 return;
00670 
00671         lmm1 = &lmv->lmv_md_v1;
00672         CDEBUG(level, "magic 0x%08X, master %#X stripe_count %#x\n",
00673                le32_to_cpu(lmm1->lmv_magic),
00674                le32_to_cpu(lmm1->lmv_master_mdt_index),
00675                le32_to_cpu(lmm1->lmv_stripe_count));
00676 
00677         if (le32_to_cpu(lmm1->lmv_magic) == LMV_MAGIC_STRIPE)
00678                 return;
00679 
00680         for (i = 0; i < le32_to_cpu(lmm1->lmv_stripe_count); i++) {
00681                 struct lu_fid fid;
00682 
00683                 fid_le_to_cpu(&fid, &lmm1->lmv_stripe_fids[i]);
00684                 CDEBUG(level, "idx %u subobj "DFID"\n", i, PFID(&fid));
00685         }
00686 }
00687 
00688 /* Shrink and/or grow reply buffers */
00689 int mdt_fix_reply(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00690 {
00691         struct req_capsule *pill = info->mti_pill;
00692         struct mdt_body    *body;
00693         int                md_size, md_packed = 0;
00694         int                acl_size;
00695         int                rc = 0;
00696         ENTRY;
00697 
00698         body = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00699         LASSERT(body != NULL);
00700 
00701         if (body->mbo_valid & (OBD_MD_FLDIREA | OBD_MD_FLEASIZE |
00702                                OBD_MD_LINKNAME))
00703                 md_size = body->mbo_eadatasize;
00704         else
00705                 md_size = 0;
00706 
00707         acl_size = body->mbo_aclsize;
00708 
00709         /* this replay - not send info to client */
00710         if (info->mti_spec.no_create) {
00711                 md_size = 0;
00712                 acl_size = 0;
00713         }
00714 
00715         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Shrink to md_size = %d cookie/acl_size = %d\n",
00716                md_size, acl_size);
00717 /*
00718             &RMF_MDT_BODY,
00719             &RMF_MDT_MD,
00720             &RMF_ACL, or &RMF_LOGCOOKIES
00721 (optional)  &RMF_CAPA1,
00722 (optional)  &RMF_CAPA2,
00723 (optional)  something else
00724 */
00725 
00726         /* MDT_MD buffer may be bigger than packed value, let's shrink all
00727          * buffers before growing it */
00728         if (info->mti_big_lmm_used) {
00729                 /* big_lmm buffer may be used even without packing the result
00730                  * into reply, just for internal server needs */
00731                 if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER))
00732                         md_packed = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD,
00733                                                          RCL_SERVER);
00734 
00735                 /* free big lmm if md_size is not needed */
00736                 if (md_size == 0 || md_packed == 0) {
00737                         info->mti_big_lmm_used = 0;
00738                 } else {
00739                         /* buffer must be allocated separately */
00740                         LASSERT(info->mti_attr.ma_lmm !=
00741                                 req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD));
00742                         req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, 0, RCL_SERVER);
00743                 }
00744         } else if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER)) {
00745                 req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, md_size, RCL_SERVER);
00746         }
00747 
00748         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_ACL, RCL_SERVER))
00749                 req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_ACL, acl_size, RCL_SERVER);
00750         else if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_SERVER))
00751                 req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES,
00752                                    acl_size, RCL_SERVER);
00753 
00754         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_CAPA1, RCL_SERVER) &&
00755             !(body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLMDSCAPA))
00756                 req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_CAPA1, 0, RCL_SERVER);
00757 
00758         if (req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_CAPA2, RCL_SERVER) &&
00759             !(body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLOSSCAPA))
00760                 req_capsule_shrink(pill, &RMF_CAPA2, 0, RCL_SERVER);
00761 
00762         /*
00763          * Some more field should be shrinked if needed.
00764          * This should be done by those who added fields to reply message.
00765          */
00766 
00767         /* Grow MD buffer if needed finally */
00768         if (info->mti_big_lmm_used) {
00769                 void *lmm;
00770 
00771                 LASSERT(md_size > md_packed);
00772                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Enlarge reply buffer, need extra %d bytes\n",
00773                        md_size - md_packed);
00774                 rc = req_capsule_server_grow(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, md_size);
00775                 if (rc) {
00776                         /* we can't answer with proper LOV EA, drop flags,
00777                          * the rc is also returned so this request is
00778                          * considered as failed */
00779                         body->mbo_valid &= ~(OBD_MD_FLDIREA | OBD_MD_FLEASIZE);
00780                         /* don't return transno along with error */
00781                         lustre_msg_set_transno(pill->rc_req->rq_repmsg, 0);
00782                 } else {
00783                         /* now we need to pack right LOV/LMV EA */
00784                         lmm = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD);
00785                         if (info->mti_attr.ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
00786                                 LASSERT(req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD,
00787                                                              RCL_SERVER) ==
00788                                                 info->mti_attr.ma_lmm_size);
00789                                 memcpy(lmm, info->mti_attr.ma_lmm,
00790                                        info->mti_attr.ma_lmm_size);
00791                         } else if (info->mti_attr.ma_valid & MA_LMV) {
00792                                 LASSERT(req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_MD,
00793                                                              RCL_SERVER) ==
00794                                                 info->mti_attr.ma_lmv_size);
00795                                 memcpy(lmm, info->mti_attr.ma_lmv,
00796                                        info->mti_attr.ma_lmv_size);
00797                         }
00798                 }
00799                 /* update mdt_max_mdsize so clients will be aware about that */
00800                 if (info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize < info->mti_attr.ma_lmm_size)
00801                         info->mti_mdt->mdt_max_mdsize =
00802                                                     info->mti_attr.ma_lmm_size;
00803                 info->mti_big_lmm_used = 0;
00804         }
00805         RETURN(rc);
00806 }
00807 
00808 
00809 /* if object is dying, pack the lov/llog data,
00810  * parameter info->mti_attr should be valid at this point! */
00811 int mdt_handle_last_unlink(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *mo,
00812                            const struct md_attr *ma)
00813 {
00814         struct mdt_body       *repbody;
00815         const struct lu_attr *la = &ma->ma_attr;
00816         ENTRY;
00817 
00818         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00819         LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
00820 
00821         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE)
00822                 mdt_pack_attr2body(info, repbody, la, mdt_object_fid(mo));
00823 
00824         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
00825                 CERROR("No need in LOV EA upon unlink\n");
00826                 dump_stack();
00827         }
00828         repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
00829 
00830         RETURN(0);
00831 }
00832 
00833 static __u64 mdt_attr_valid_xlate(__u64 in, struct mdt_reint_record *rr,
00834                                   struct md_attr *ma)
00835 {
00836         __u64 out;
00837 
00838         out = 0;
00839         if (in & MDS_ATTR_MODE)
00840                 out |= LA_MODE;
00841         if (in & MDS_ATTR_UID)
00842                 out |= LA_UID;
00843         if (in & MDS_ATTR_GID)
00844                 out |= LA_GID;
00845         if (in & MDS_ATTR_SIZE)
00846                 out |= LA_SIZE;
00847         if (in & MDS_ATTR_BLOCKS)
00848                 out |= LA_BLOCKS;
00849         if (in & MDS_ATTR_ATIME_SET)
00850                 out |= LA_ATIME;
00851         if (in & MDS_ATTR_CTIME_SET)
00852                 out |= LA_CTIME;
00853         if (in & MDS_ATTR_MTIME_SET)
00854                 out |= LA_MTIME;
00855         if (in & MDS_ATTR_ATTR_FLAG)
00856                 out |= LA_FLAGS;
00857         if (in & MDS_ATTR_KILL_SUID)
00858                 out |= LA_KILL_SUID;
00859         if (in & MDS_ATTR_KILL_SGID)
00860                 out |= LA_KILL_SGID;
00861 
00862         if (in & MDS_ATTR_FROM_OPEN)
00863                 rr->rr_flags |= MRF_OPEN_TRUNC;
00864         if (in & MDS_OPEN_OWNEROVERRIDE)
00865                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_OWNEROVERRIDE;
00866         if (in & MDS_ATTR_FORCE)
00867                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_PERM_BYPASS;
00868 
00869         in &= ~(MDS_ATTR_MODE | MDS_ATTR_UID | MDS_ATTR_GID |
00870                 MDS_ATTR_ATIME | MDS_ATTR_MTIME | MDS_ATTR_CTIME |
00871                 MDS_ATTR_ATIME_SET | MDS_ATTR_CTIME_SET | MDS_ATTR_MTIME_SET |
00872                 MDS_ATTR_SIZE | MDS_ATTR_BLOCKS | MDS_ATTR_ATTR_FLAG |
00873                 MDS_ATTR_FORCE | MDS_ATTR_KILL_SUID | MDS_ATTR_KILL_SGID |
00874                 MDS_ATTR_FROM_OPEN | MDS_OPEN_OWNEROVERRIDE);
00875         if (in != 0)
00876                 CERROR("Unknown attr bits: "LPX64"\n", in);
00877         return out;
00878 }
00879 
00880 /* unpacking */
00881 
00882 int mdt_name_unpack(struct req_capsule *pill,
00883                     const struct req_msg_field *field,
00884                     struct lu_name *ln,
00885                     enum mdt_name_flags flags)
00886 {
00887         ln->ln_name = req_capsule_client_get(pill, field);
00888         ln->ln_namelen = req_capsule_get_size(pill, field, RCL_CLIENT) - 1;
00889 
00890         if (!lu_name_is_valid(ln)) {
00891                 ln->ln_name = NULL;
00892                 ln->ln_namelen = 0;
00893 
00894                 return -EPROTO;
00895         }
00896 
00897         if ((flags & MNF_FIX_ANON) &&
00898             ln->ln_namelen == 1 && ln->ln_name[0] == '/') {
00899                 /* Newer (3.x) kernels use a name of "/" for the
00900                  * "anonymous" disconnected dentries from NFS
00901                  * filehandle conversion. See d_obtain_alias(). */
00902                 ln->ln_name = NULL;
00903                 ln->ln_namelen = 0;
00904         }
00905 
00906         return 0;
00907 }
00908 
00909 static int mdt_setattr_unpack_rec(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00910 {
00911         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00912         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00913         struct lu_attr          *la = &ma->ma_attr;
00914         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
00915         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
00916         struct mdt_rec_setattr  *rec;
00917         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap =
00918                 info->mti_exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00919         ENTRY;
00920 
00921         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_setattr)== sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
00922         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00923         if (rec == NULL)
00924                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
00925 
00926         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
00927         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->sa_fsuid;
00928         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->sa_fsgid;
00929         uc->uc_cap   = rec->sa_cap;
00930         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->sa_suppgid;
00931         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00932 
00933         rr->rr_fid1 = &rec->sa_fid;
00934         la->la_valid = mdt_attr_valid_xlate(rec->sa_valid, rr, ma);
00935         la->la_mode  = rec->sa_mode;
00936         la->la_flags = rec->sa_attr_flags;
00937         la->la_uid   = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00938                                       NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, rec->sa_uid);
00939         la->la_gid   = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00940                                       NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, rec->sa_gid);
00941         la->la_size  = rec->sa_size;
00942         la->la_blocks = rec->sa_blocks;
00943         la->la_ctime = rec->sa_ctime;
00944         la->la_atime = rec->sa_atime;
00945         la->la_mtime = rec->sa_mtime;
00946         ma->ma_valid = MA_INODE;
00947 
00948         if (rec->sa_bias & MDS_DATA_MODIFIED)
00949                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_DATA_MODIFIED;
00950         else
00951                 ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_DATA_MODIFIED;
00952 
00953         if (rec->sa_bias & MDS_HSM_RELEASE)
00954                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_HSM_RELEASE;
00955         else
00956                 ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_HSM_RELEASE;
00957 
00958         if (rec->sa_bias & MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP)
00959                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP;
00960         else
00961                 ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP;
00962 
00963         RETURN(0);
00964 }
00965 
00966 static int mdt_close_handle_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00967 {
00968         struct req_capsule *pill = info->mti_pill;
00969         struct mdt_ioepoch *ioepoch;
00970         ENTRY;
00971 
00972         if (req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH, RCL_CLIENT))
00973                 ioepoch = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH);
00974         else
00975                 ioepoch = NULL;
00976 
00977         if (ioepoch == NULL)
00978                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00979 
00980         info->mti_close_handle = ioepoch->mio_handle;
00981 
00982         RETURN(0);
00983 }
00984 
00985 static inline int mdt_dlmreq_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info) {
00986         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
00987 
00988         if (req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_DLM_REQ, RCL_CLIENT)) {
00989                 info->mti_dlm_req = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_DLM_REQ);
00990                 if (info->mti_dlm_req == NULL)
00991                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
00992         }
00993 
00994         RETURN(0);
00995 }
00996 
00997 static int mdt_setattr_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00998 {
00999         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01000         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01001         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01002         int rc;
01003         ENTRY;
01004 
01005         rc = mdt_setattr_unpack_rec(info);
01006         if (rc)
01007                 RETURN(rc);
01008 
01009         if (req_capsule_field_present(pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT)) {
01010                 rr->rr_eadata = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_EADATA);
01011                 rr->rr_eadatalen = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA,
01012                                                         RCL_CLIENT);
01013                 if (rr->rr_eadatalen > 0) {
01014                         const struct lmv_user_md        *lum;
01015 
01016                         lum = rr->rr_eadata;
01017                         /* Sigh ma_valid(from req) does not indicate whether
01018                          * it will set LOV/LMV EA, so we have to check magic */
01019                         if (le32_to_cpu(lum->lum_magic) == LMV_USER_MAGIC) {
01020                                 ma->ma_valid |= MA_LMV;
01021                                 ma->ma_lmv = (void *)rr->rr_eadata;
01022                                 ma->ma_lmv_size = rr->rr_eadatalen;
01023                         } else {
01024                                 ma->ma_valid |= MA_LOV;
01025                                 ma->ma_lmm = (void *)rr->rr_eadata;
01026                                 ma->ma_lmm_size = rr->rr_eadatalen;
01027                         }
01028                 }
01029         }
01030 
01031         rc = mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info);
01032         RETURN(rc);
01033 }
01034 
01035 static int mdt_intent_close_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01036 {
01037         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01038         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01039         ENTRY;
01040 
01041         if (!(ma->ma_attr_flags & (MDS_HSM_RELEASE | MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP)))
01042                 RETURN(0);
01043 
01044         req_capsule_extend(pill, &RQF_MDS_INTENT_CLOSE);
01045 
01046         if (!(req_capsule_has_field(pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA, RCL_CLIENT) &&
01047             req_capsule_field_present(pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA, RCL_CLIENT)))
01048                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01049 
01050         RETURN(0);
01051 }
01052 
01053 int mdt_close_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01054 {
01055         int rc;
01056         ENTRY;
01057 
01058         rc = mdt_close_handle_unpack(info);
01059         if (rc)
01060                 RETURN(rc);
01061 
01062         rc = mdt_setattr_unpack_rec(info);
01063         if (rc)
01064                 RETURN(rc);
01065 
01066         rc = mdt_intent_close_unpack(info);
01067         if (rc)
01068                 RETURN(rc);
01069 
01070         RETURN(mdt_init_ucred_reint(info));
01071 }
01072 
01073 static int mdt_create_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01074 {
01075         struct lu_ucred         *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
01076         struct mdt_rec_create   *rec;
01077         struct lu_attr          *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01078         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01079         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01080         struct md_op_spec       *sp = &info->mti_spec;
01081         int rc;
01082         ENTRY;
01083 
01084         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_create) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
01085         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01086         if (rec == NULL)
01087                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01088 
01089         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01090         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->cr_fsuid;
01091         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->cr_fsgid;
01092         uc->uc_cap   = rec->cr_cap;
01093         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->cr_suppgid1;
01094         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
01095         uc->uc_umask = rec->cr_umask;
01096 
01097         rr->rr_fid1 = &rec->cr_fid1;
01098         rr->rr_fid2 = &rec->cr_fid2;
01099         attr->la_mode = rec->cr_mode;
01100         attr->la_rdev  = rec->cr_rdev;
01101         attr->la_uid   = rec->cr_fsuid;
01102         attr->la_gid   = rec->cr_fsgid;
01103         attr->la_ctime = rec->cr_time;
01104         attr->la_mtime = rec->cr_time;
01105         attr->la_atime = rec->cr_time;
01106         attr->la_valid = LA_MODE | LA_RDEV | LA_UID | LA_GID | LA_TYPE |
01107                          LA_CTIME | LA_MTIME | LA_ATIME;
01108         memset(&sp->u, 0, sizeof(sp->u));
01109         sp->sp_cr_flags = get_mrc_cr_flags(rec);
01110 
01111         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, 0);
01112         if (rc < 0)
01113                 RETURN(rc);
01114 
01115         if (S_ISLNK(attr->la_mode)) {
01116                 const char *tgt = NULL;
01117 
01118                 req_capsule_extend(pill, &RQF_MDS_REINT_CREATE_SYM);
01119                 if (req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_SYMTGT, RCL_CLIENT)) {
01120                         tgt = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_SYMTGT);
01121                         sp->u.sp_symname = tgt;
01122                 }
01123                 if (tgt == NULL)
01124                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
01125         } else {
01126                 req_capsule_extend(pill, &RQF_MDS_REINT_CREATE_RMT_ACL);
01127                 if (S_ISDIR(attr->la_mode) &&
01128                     req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT) > 0) {
01129                         sp->u.sp_ea.eadata =
01130                                 req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_EADATA);
01131                         sp->u.sp_ea.eadatalen =
01132                                 req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA,
01133                                                      RCL_CLIENT);
01134                         sp->sp_cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA;
01135                 }
01136         }
01137 
01138         rc = mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info);
01139         RETURN(rc);
01140 }
01141 
01142 static int mdt_link_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01143 {
01144         struct lu_ucred         *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);

01148         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01149         int rc;
01150         ENTRY;
01151 
01152         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_link) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));

01154         if (rec == NULL)
01155                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01156 
01157         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01158         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->lk_fsuid;
01159         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->lk_fsgid;
01160         uc->uc_cap   = rec->lk_cap;
01161         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->lk_suppgid1;
01162         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = rec->lk_suppgid2;
01163 
01164         attr->la_uid = rec->lk_fsuid;
01165         attr->la_gid = rec->lk_fsgid;
01166         rr->rr_fid1 = &rec->lk_fid1;
01167         rr->rr_fid2 = &rec->lk_fid2;
01168         attr->la_ctime = rec->lk_time;
01169         attr->la_mtime = rec->lk_time;
01170         attr->la_valid = LA_UID | LA_GID | LA_CTIME | LA_MTIME;
01171 
01172         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, 0);
01173         if (rc < 0)
01174                 RETURN(rc);
01175 
01176         rc = mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info);
01177 
01178         RETURN(rc);
01179 }

01181 static int mdt_unlink_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01182 {
01183         struct lu_ucred         *uc  = mdt_ucred(info);
01184         struct mdt_rec_unlink   *rec;
01185         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01186         struct lu_attr          *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01187         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01188         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01189         int rc;
01190         ENTRY;
01191 
01192         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_unlink) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
01193         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01194         if (rec == NULL)
01195                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01196 
01197         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01198         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->ul_fsuid;
01199         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->ul_fsgid;
01200         uc->uc_cap   = rec->ul_cap;
01201         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->ul_suppgid1;
01202         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
01203 
01204         attr->la_uid = rec->ul_fsuid;
01205         attr->la_gid = rec->ul_fsgid;
01206         rr->rr_fid1 = &rec->ul_fid1;
01207         rr->rr_fid2 = &rec->ul_fid2;
01208         attr->la_ctime = rec->ul_time;
01209         attr->la_mtime = rec->ul_time;
01210         attr->la_mode  = rec->ul_mode;
01211         attr->la_valid = LA_UID | LA_GID | LA_CTIME | LA_MTIME | LA_MODE;
01212 
01213         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, 0);
01214         if (rc < 0)
01215                 RETURN(rc);
01216 
01217         if (rec->ul_bias & MDS_VTX_BYPASS)
01218                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_VTX_BYPASS;
01219         else
01220                 ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_VTX_BYPASS;
01221 
01222         info->mti_spec.no_create = !!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info));
01223 
01224         rc = mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info);
01225         RETURN(rc);
01226 }
01227 
01228 static int mdt_rmentry_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01229 {
01230         info->mti_spec.sp_rm_entry = 1;
01231         return mdt_unlink_unpack(info);
01232 }
01233 
01234 static int mdt_rename_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01235 {
01236         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
01237         struct mdt_rec_rename   *rec;
01238         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01239         struct lu_attr          *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01240         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01241         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01242         int rc;
01243         ENTRY;
01244 
01245         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_rename) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
01246         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01247         if (rec == NULL)
01248                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01249 
01250         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01251         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->rn_fsuid;
01252         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->rn_fsgid;
01253         uc->uc_cap   = rec->rn_cap;
01254         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->rn_suppgid1;
01255         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = rec->rn_suppgid2;
01256 
01257         attr->la_uid = rec->rn_fsuid;
01258         attr->la_gid = rec->rn_fsgid;
01259         rr->rr_fid1 = &rec->rn_fid1;
01260         rr->rr_fid2 = &rec->rn_fid2;
01261         attr->la_ctime = rec->rn_time;
01262         attr->la_mtime = rec->rn_time;
01263         /* rename_tgt contains the mode already */
01264         attr->la_mode = rec->rn_mode;
01265         attr->la_valid = LA_UID | LA_GID | LA_CTIME | LA_MTIME | LA_MODE;
01266 
01267         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, 0);
01268         if (rc < 0)
01269                 RETURN(rc);
01270 
01271         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_SYMTGT, &rr->rr_tgt_name, 0);
01272         if (rc < 0)
01273                 RETURN(rc);
01274 
01275         if (rec->rn_bias & MDS_VTX_BYPASS)
01276                 ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_VTX_BYPASS;
01277         else
01278                 ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_VTX_BYPASS;
01279 
01280         if (rec->rn_bias & MDS_RENAME_MIGRATE) {
01281                 req_capsule_extend(info->mti_pill, &RQF_MDS_REINT_MIGRATE);
01282                 rc = mdt_close_handle_unpack(info);
01283                 if (rc < 0)
01284                         RETURN(rc);
01285                 info->mti_spec.sp_migrate_close = 1;
01286         }
01287 
01288         info->mti_spec.no_create = !!req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info));
01289 
01290 
01291         rc = mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info);
01292 
01293         RETURN(rc);
01294 }
01295 
01296 /*
01297  * please see comment above LOV_MAGIC_V1_DEF
01298  */
01299 static void mdt_fix_lov_magic(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01300 {
01301         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01302         struct lov_user_md_v1   *v1;
01303 
01304         v1 = (void *)rr->rr_eadata;
01305         LASSERT(v1);
01306 
01307         if (unlikely(req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))) {
01308                 if (v1->lmm_magic == LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1) {
01309                         v1->lmm_magic = LOV_MAGIC_V1_DEF;
01310                 } else if (v1->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1)) {
01311                         v1->lmm_magic = __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V1_DEF);
01312                 } else if (v1->lmm_magic == LOV_USER_MAGIC_V3) {
01313                         v1->lmm_magic = LOV_MAGIC_V3_DEF;
01314                 } else if (v1->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_USER_MAGIC_V3)) {
01315                         v1->lmm_magic = __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V3_DEF);
01316                 }
01317         }
01318 }
01319 
01320 static int mdt_open_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01321 {
01322         struct lu_ucred         *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
01323         struct mdt_rec_create   *rec;
01324         struct lu_attr          *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01325         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
01326         struct mdt_reint_record *rr   = &info->mti_rr;
01327         struct ptlrpc_request   *req  = mdt_info_req(info);
01328         struct md_op_spec       *sp   = &info->mti_spec;
01329         ENTRY;
01330 
01331         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_create) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
01332         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01333         if (rec == NULL)
01334                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01335 
01336         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01337         uc->uc_fsuid = rec->cr_fsuid;
01338         uc->uc_fsgid = rec->cr_fsgid;
01339         uc->uc_cap   = rec->cr_cap;
01340         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->cr_suppgid1;
01341         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = rec->cr_suppgid2;
01342         uc->uc_umask = rec->cr_umask;
01343 
01344         rr->rr_fid1   = &rec->cr_fid1;
01345         rr->rr_fid2   = &rec->cr_fid2;
01346         rr->rr_handle = &rec->cr_old_handle;
01347         attr->la_mode = rec->cr_mode;
01348         attr->la_rdev  = rec->cr_rdev;
01349         attr->la_uid   = rec->cr_fsuid;
01350         attr->la_gid   = rec->cr_fsgid;
01351         attr->la_ctime = rec->cr_time;
01352         attr->la_mtime = rec->cr_time;
01353         attr->la_atime = rec->cr_time;
01354         attr->la_valid = LA_MODE  | LA_RDEV  | LA_UID   | LA_GID |
01355                          LA_CTIME | LA_MTIME | LA_ATIME;
01356         memset(&info->mti_spec.u, 0, sizeof(info->mti_spec.u));
01357         info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags = get_mrc_cr_flags(rec);
01358         /* Do not trigger ASSERTION if client miss to set such flags. */
01359         if (unlikely(info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags == 0))
01360                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
01361 
01362         info->mti_cross_ref = !!(rec->cr_bias & MDS_CROSS_REF);
01363 
01364         mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, MNF_FIX_ANON);
01365 
01366         if (req_capsule_field_present(pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT)) {
01367                 rr->rr_eadatalen = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA,
01368                                                         RCL_CLIENT);
01369                 if (rr->rr_eadatalen > 0) {
01370                         rr->rr_eadata = req_capsule_client_get(pill,
01371                                                                &RMF_EADATA);
01372                         sp->u.sp_ea.eadatalen = rr->rr_eadatalen;
01373                         sp->u.sp_ea.eadata = rr->rr_eadata;
01374                         sp->no_create = !!req_is_replay(req);
01375                         mdt_fix_lov_magic(info);
01376                 }
01377 
01378                 /*
01379                  * Client default md_size may be 0 right after client start,
01380                  * until all osc are connected, set here just some reasonable
01381                  * value to prevent misbehavior.
01382                  */
01383                 if (rr->rr_eadatalen == 0 &&
01384                     !(info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags & MDS_OPEN_DELAY_CREATE))
01385                         rr->rr_eadatalen = MIN_MD_SIZE;
01386         }
01387 
01388         RETURN(0);
01389 }
01390 
01391 static int mdt_setxattr_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
01392 {
01393         struct mdt_reint_record *rr     = &info->mti_rr;
01394         struct lu_ucred         *uc     = mdt_ucred(info);
01395         struct lu_attr          *attr   = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
01396         struct req_capsule      *pill   = info->mti_pill;
01397         struct mdt_rec_setxattr *rec;
01398         int                      rc;
01399         ENTRY;
01400 
01401 
01402         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_setxattr) ==
01403                          sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint));
01404 
01405         rec = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
01406         if (rec == NULL)
01407                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01408 
01409         /* This prior initialization is needed for old_init_ucred_reint() */
01410         uc->uc_fsuid  = rec->sx_fsuid;
01411         uc->uc_fsgid  = rec->sx_fsgid;
01412         uc->uc_cap    = rec->sx_cap;
01413         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = rec->sx_suppgid1;
01414         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
01415 
01416         rr->rr_opcode = rec->sx_opcode;
01417         rr->rr_fid1   = &rec->sx_fid;
01418         attr->la_valid = rec->sx_valid;
01419         attr->la_ctime = rec->sx_time;
01420         attr->la_size = rec->sx_size;
01421         attr->la_flags = rec->sx_flags;
01422 
01423         rc = mdt_name_unpack(pill, &RMF_NAME, &rr->rr_name, 0);
01424         if (rc < 0)
01425                 RETURN(rc);
01426 
01427         if (req_capsule_field_present(pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT)) {
01428                 rr->rr_eadatalen = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_EADATA,
01429                                                         RCL_CLIENT);
01430                 if (rr->rr_eadatalen > 0) {
01431                         rr->rr_eadata = req_capsule_client_get(pill,
01432                                                                &RMF_EADATA);
01433                         if (rr->rr_eadata == NULL)
01434                                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01435                 } else {
01436                         rr->rr_eadata = NULL;
01437                 }
01438         } else if (!(attr->la_valid & OBD_MD_FLXATTRRM)) {
01439                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "no xattr data supplied\n");
01440                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01441         }
01442 
01443         if (mdt_dlmreq_unpack(info) < 0)
01444                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
01445 
01446         RETURN(0);
01447 }
01448 
01449 
01450 typedef int (*reint_unpacker)(struct mdt_thread_info *info);
01451 
01452 static reint_unpacker mdt_reint_unpackers[REINT_MAX] = {
01453         [REINT_SETATTR]  = mdt_setattr_unpack,
01454         [REINT_CREATE]   = mdt_create_unpack,
01455         [REINT_LINK]     = mdt_link_unpack,
01456         [REINT_UNLINK]   = mdt_unlink_unpack,
01457         [REINT_RENAME]   = mdt_rename_unpack,
01458         [REINT_OPEN]     = mdt_open_unpack,
01459         [REINT_SETXATTR] = mdt_setxattr_unpack,
01460         [REINT_RMENTRY]  = mdt_rmentry_unpack,
01461         [REINT_MIGRATE]  = mdt_rename_unpack,
01462 };
01463 
01464 int mdt_reint_unpack(struct mdt_thread_info *info, __u32 op)
01465 {
01466         int rc;
01467         ENTRY;
01468 
01469         memset(&info->mti_rr, 0, sizeof(info->mti_rr));
01470         if (op < REINT_MAX && mdt_reint_unpackers[op] != NULL) {
01471                 info->mti_rr.rr_opcode = op;
01472                 rc = mdt_reint_unpackers[op](info);
01473         } else {
01474                 CERROR("Unexpected opcode %d\n", op);
01475                 rc = -EFAULT;
01476         }
01477         RETURN(rc);
01478 }
